definition: Attributes that describe characteristics or qualities of commercial services and hospitality offerings.

positive_examples: The hotel room features a king-size bed and ocean view.
This restaurant offers 24-hour room service to guests.
The spa is currently closed for renovations.
The penthouse suite includes a private balcony and concierge service.
The fitness center is open from 6 AM to 10 PM daily.
The hotel lobby has complimentary WiFi and business center access.
negative_examples: The building has five floors and an elevator.
She has excellent communication skills and leadership experience.
The car's engine is powerful and fuel-efficient.
The software has advanced security features and cloud integration.
His personality is outgoing and friendly.
The city's population is growing rapidly this decade.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: PhysicalAttribute, PersonalAttribute, TemporalAttribute, SpatialAttribute
